question: Which of the following is the correct order of composition of biogas released through anaerobic bio-digester system?
explanation:
The correct composition of biogas released through anaerobic bio-digester system is:
Methane (CH4) - 50–75 %
Carbon dioxide (CO2) - 25–50%
Nitrogen (N2) - 0–10%
Hydrogen (H2) - 0–1%
Hydrogen sulphide (H2S) - 0–3%
